name: S'mores Pretzel Bites
author: SunnyDaysNora
summary: These irresistible little bites are full of the playful flavors of s'mores--marshmallow cream, chocolate, and graham cracker crumbs--on light Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®!
ingredients: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
directions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Place a heaping teaspoon of marshmallow cream off center on Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisp®
Melt chocolate in a microwave-safe glass or ceramic bowl in 15-second intervals, stirring after each melting, 1 to 3 minutes
Line a work surface with waxed paper
Dip marshmallow-covered half of pretzels in melted chocolate about halfway up
Place on waxed paper and immediately sprinkle with graham cracker crumbs
Allow chocolate to harden before removing bites from waxed paper, about 5 minutes
